thread.title: Ex-breeder convicted after dead dogs found in freezer | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Ex-breeder convicted after dead dogs found in freezer | Daily Mail Online

author: Ashleigh Davis For Daily Mail Australia
title: Ex-breeder convicted after dead dogs found in freezer | Daily Mail Online
text: Dogs in the freezer, bodies burnt in pits and blood-smeared kennels: Ex-breeder is convicted of cruelty after his home is found littered with dead and suffering animals A 41-year-old Sydney man has been convicted of 15 counts of animal cruelty Todd Baker was fined more than $80,000, received a three-year good behaviour bond and was banned from owning any animals for 10 years RSPCA found five dead dogs in freezers on his property and one burnt in a pit Also found dogs without shelter or water and 18 with painful medical conditions WARNING: This story contains distressing images of animals
